mapper.sql: applyid, apply_no, itemid, userid, `status`, `describe`, certid, created_date, submit_date, item_value, price, wf_instance_id, handle_created_date, handle_userid, pay_status, pay_end_price, item_code, reject_reason, pay_end_date, add_file_status
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_item_apply
apply_no,
itemid,
userid,
`status`,
`describe`,
certid,
created_date,
submit_date,
item_value,
price,
wf_instance_id,
handle_created_date,
handle_userid,
pay_status,
pay_end_price,
item_code,
#{applyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{certid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{itemValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update biz_item_apply
apply_no = #{applyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certid = #{certid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wf_instance_id = #{wfInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_created_date = #{handleCreatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_userid = #{handleUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_end_price = #{payEndPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_end_date = #{payEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where applyid = #{applyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ucuser.`username` AS `username`, audit.`audit_date` AS `auditDate`, audit.`status` AS `status`, audit.`reason` AS `reason`, certfile.`file_url` AS `fileUrl` FROM wf_inst_audit_track AS audit LEFT JOIN `biz_item_apply` AS apply ON apply.wf_instance_id = audit.instid LEFT JOIN uc_user AS ucuser ON ucuser.userid = audit.userid LEFT JOIN biz_cert_files AS certfile ON certfile.file_id = audit.fileid WHERE apply.applyid = #{applyid} ORDER BY auditDate DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM biz_item_apply WHERE `status` = #{status} AND handle_userid = 0

SELECT itemapply.applyid AS applyid, itemapply.apply_no AS applyNo, itemapply.created_date AS createdDate, itemapply.`status` AS `status`, item.item_name AS itemName, item.logo_url AS logoUrl, item.itemid AS itemid FROM biz_item_apply itemapply LEFT JOIN biz_org_items item ON itemapply.itemid = item.itemid WHERE itemapply.userid = #{userId} GROUP BY itemapply.applyid ORDER BY itemapply.created_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT itemapply.applyid AS applyid, itemapply.apply_no AS applyNo, itemapply.submit_date AS submitDate, itemapply.`status` AS `status`, item.item_name AS itemName, item.logo_url AS logoUrl, item.itemid AS itemid FROM biz_item_apply itemapply LEFT JOIN biz_org_items item ON itemapply.itemid = item.itemid WHERE itemapply.`status` = #{status} AND itemapply.handle_userid = 0 GROUP BY itemapply.applyid ORDER BY itemapply.submit_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT count(1) FROM biz_item_apply AS itemapply WHERE itemapply.pay_status = #{payStatus} AND itemapply.`status` = #{status} AND itemapply.wf_instance_id IN ( SELECT id FROM wf_instance WHERE nodeid IN ( SELECT id FROM wf_item_node_define WHERE audit_userid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%') ) )
select count(1) from biz_item_apply where userid = #{userId}

SELECT usercard.real_name AS realName, ucuser.username AS userPhone, usercard.card_number AS cardNumber, apply.apply_no AS applyNo, apply.add_file_status AS addFileStatus, apply.submit_date AS submitDate, apply.userid AS userId, items.item_name AS itemName, apply.item_value AS itemValue, apply.`status` AS `status`, apply.`describe` AS `describe`, items.valuation AS `valuation`, items.is_appointment AS isAppointment, apply.pay_status AS `payStatus`, apply.applyid AS applyid FROM biz_org AS bizorg LEFT JOIN biz_org_items AS items ON items.orgid = bizorg.itemid LEFT JOIN biz_item_apply AS apply ON apply.itemid = items.itemid LEFT JOIN uc_user AS ucuser ON apply.userid = ucuser.userid LEFT JOIN `sys_user_card` AS usercard ON apply.userid = usercard.userid WHERE apply.applyid = #{applyid}
AND apply.userid = #{userId}

SELECT usercard.real_name AS realName, usercard.card_number AS cardNumber, items.item_name AS itemName, ucuser.username AS userPhone, apply.apply_no AS applyNo, apply.submit_date AS submitDate FROM biz_org_items AS items LEFT JOIN biz_item_apply AS apply ON apply.itemid = items.itemid LEFT JOIN uc_user AS ucuser ON apply.userid = ucuser.userid LEFT JOIN `sys_user_card` AS usercard ON apply.userid = usercard.userid WHERE apply.applyid = #{applyid}
SELECT count(1) FROM biz_item_apply AS itemapply WHERE itemapply.`status` = #{status}
SELECT count(1) FROM biz_item_apply AS itemapply WHERE itemapply.`status` = #{review} AND itemapply.handle_userid = #{userId}

SELECT item.item_name AS itemName, charge.crated_date AS payDate, usercard.real_name AS payName FROM biz_item_apply AS apply LEFT JOIN biz_org_items AS item ON apply.itemid = item.itemid LEFT JOIN sys_user_card AS usercard ON apply.userid = usercard.userid LEFT JOIN biz_charge_detail AS charge ON ( charge.apply_id = apply.applyid AND charge.is_pay = 1 AND charge.pay_status = 0 AND charge.is_del = 0 ) WHERE apply.applyid = #{applyid} AND charge.charge_id = ( SELECT id FROM `biz_item_charge` WHERE `name` = '公证预付款' )

SELECT charge.id as id, itemcharge.`name` as `feeName`, charge.price as `price`, charge.file_num as fileNum FROM biz_charge_detail AS charge LEFT JOIN biz_item_charge AS itemcharge ON itemcharge.id = charge.charge_id WHERE charge.apply_id = #{applyid} AND charge.is_pay = 1 AND charge.is_del = 0
mapper.update: update biz_item_apply SET `add_file_status` = 1 WHERE `applyid` = (SELECT applyid FROM `biz_item_apply_files` where fileid = #{id})
